url.description: The URL of the advertiserâ€™s website.

DspAdvertisersV1.description: List of advertisers along with total number of advertisers which satisfy the filtering criteria.

response.description: List of advertisers with complete information.

totalResults.description: Total number of advertisers which satisfy the filtering criteria. This number is given to support pagination and tell the client if there are more advertisers to be fetched.

errors.description: List of errors. Useful in case of validation errors

message.description: A human-readable description of the response.

requestId.description: A value will be used to identify your request uniquely.

field.description: Request body field which is cause of the error.

DspTimezoneV1.description:
The advertiser timezone.
- America/Anchorage
- America/Caracas
- America/Chicago
- America/Denver
- America/Halifax
- America/Los_Angeles
- America/New_York
- America/Sao_Paulo
- America/St_Johns
- As...

oauth2AuthorizationCode.description: Login with Amazon. For more information see [Login with Amazon authorization code grant](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/login-with-amazon/authorization-code-grant.html).

scopes.advertising::campaign_management: Modify your DSP advertising campaigns and access performance data

get.description: Returns a list of advertisers with information which satisfy the filtering criteria.

parameters.description: The client identifier of the customer making the request.
parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-ClientId

parameters.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use GET method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header.
parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope

parameters.description: Sets a cursor into the requested set of advertisers. Use in conjunction with the count parameter to control pagination of the returned array. 0-indexed record offset for the result set, defaults to 0.
parameters.name: startIndex

parameters.description: Sets the number of advertisers to be returned in a single call. Maximum of 100 advertisers per call.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: List of comma separated advertiser ids to filter the advertisers. If no advertiser ids provided, all advertisers in this entity will be returned.
parameters.name: advertiserIdFilter

403.description: Forbidden - Request failed because user is not authorized to access a resource.

404.description: Not Found - Requested resource does not exist or is not visible for the authenticated user.

422.description: Unprocessable entity - Failed due to invalid parameters.

429.description: Too Many Requests - Request was rate-limited. Retry later.

get.description: Returns advertiser information based on given advertiser id.

parameters.description: The client identifier of the customer making the request.
parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-ClientId

parameters.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use GET method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header.
parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope

403.description: Forbidden - Request failed because user is not authorized to access a resource.

404.description: Not Found - Requested resource does not exist or is not visible for the authenticated user.
